name: places/ChIJxxwJ24NZwokR0HJ4HW9jw5U
formattedAddress: 167 Essex St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 167 Essex St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
Worst garage ever! When you get there the man rushes me, then proceeds to bang on my freshly wash car to tell me lets go. I'm sorry I gave him a tip. Didn't even check for damage on my car just rushed me to leave. After realizing he damage my car I called the manger that was assigned to my claim and he new very well who the driver was.  I've been fight with there insurance company for 2 weeks, At least what i thought was an insurance company. To find they hired a company to act as an insurance because i couldn't understand why the insurance company wasn't given all the pictures with the amount of cameras that are there. Also sign stating the cameras are there for your protection. During the course of 2weeks, I was going back and forth with the insurance. The garage kept changing where the damage was upon entry but at the same time there accusations were only the molding of how my bumper is manufactured. After communicating 2 week by email and asking several times to speak with someone or the insurance person Manger. She finally calls only to state that i have to call the garage manager he is the one who closed the claim. After going back to there garage to look at the 1 camera that showed no damage on my car! That is the only picture they choose to show. My bumper was so clean you can see the reflection of there broken curb apon entry. For my inconvenience of there rude drive they gave me a free parking voucher. I want my car fix not a voucher. By far worst communication, managing all round disfunctional company that likes to beat around the bush when they are wrong. Send your money else where!!!
Here are some photos of my damage. Also the phone I took from there computer upon entry the shows no damage. I have zoom in. Also took a picture from the same view of there entry camera. Even with my dirty car you can still see the damage and the reflection from floor.

originalText.text:
We've been customers at this location for a very long time. Since the lot was much larger, before the Houston St building went up.
The current crew is the best ever!
Always ready to go above and beyond, if there's any kind of problem.

The current crew is the best ever!
Always ready to go above and beyond, if there's any kind of problem.

originalText.text: The staff was very friendly.  My car was always ready when I walked in for pick-up.  Very safe place to leave your car.  The price was great compared to others in the area.  I would certainly recommend and return on future trips.

text.text: The staff was very friendly.  My car was always ready when I walked in for pick-up.  Very safe place to leave your car.  The price was great compared to others in the area.  I would certainly recommend and return on future trips.

originalText.text: The garage attendants are super nice. They try to get you your car soon as you step foot on property. I highly recommend

originalText.text: The customer service at Edison Parkfast was disappointing; the staff was rude. Unfortunately, when I lost my ticket, they informed me that I wouldn't be able to retrieve my car, displaying unprofessionalism.

text.text: The customer service at Edison Parkfast was disappointing; the staff was rude. Unfortunately, when I lost my ticket, they informed me that I wouldn't be able to retrieve my car, displaying unprofessionalism.
